metadata.synopsis: Toobin remarks on the door leading to the control centre floor.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen ReCon and use "oe low_Foundry_FundangoFollower"turn on peace modeGo to -1962; -6; 459observe the AD play

0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
0.text: If I've counted my footsteps correctly, this door leads to the Foundry's depths - and the Neurocitor.
